Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Milwaukee, Foster, Elston, and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Milwaukee, Foster, Elston, and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Milwaukee.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays at Oak Park Affecting Blue Line Service
ShortDescription: Blue Line Line trains are experiencing a delay at Oak Park due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Updates to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line Line trains are experiencing a delay at Oak Park due to a medical emergency on the tracks. 

Assistance has been requested and personnel are working to implement service alternatives and we hope to resume service shortly.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

For Forest Park Branch riders, these may include the #7 Harrison, #20 Madison, #126 Jackson or north-south routes that can take you to the Green or Pink Lines for service to/from downtown.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.
